name: Snakes Slithering In Square Box - The New Tetroid Puzzle Game
name_original: Snakes Slithering In Square Box - The New Tetroid Puzzle Game
description:
This game is the snakes and worm on colorful characters which are classic and funny puzzle games

How to play:
you'll need a box that has a snake or worm. all fields vertically or horizontally anywhere within the allotted time. drag and drop the snakes or worms box on the same line, many will go. and you can continue indefinitely. until the stalemate is not the place to another.

Note: this game is suitable for people of all ages, kids or adults play good. you will find all the excitement, fun to play and then put down. download to play now!
